website_summaries.verdict: An updated version of the Classic 247, the New Balance 247 v2 provides excellent foot breathability, cushioning, and energy return. It looks like its predecessor but with a more aggressive midsole design, overlapping the upper to create a sportier look. With the same level of comfort but with an edgier vibe, this timeless-designed sneaker works perfectly for a variety of casual activities and occasions.
pros: The New Balance 247 v2 carries a unique and eye-catching design that is appreciated by a lot of customers
A significant number of buyers like the slip-on construction of the shoe that allows them to put it on and take it off quickly
This shoe is among the New Balance sneakers that deliver comfort in every stride, according to many users
A couple of wearers say that they can conveniently use the shoe for errand running
The low-top New Balance 247 v2 offers foot breathability that is praised by plenty of reviewers
Several testers have attested that this kick provides lightweight feel on their feet
Among the New Balance 247 collection, it is available in a plethora of colorways that are liked by several shoppers
A few of the testers say that the NB 247 v2 can quickly adapt to their foot
cons: This sneaker can get very dirty quickly, as per a couple of buyers
A customer has complained that the New Balance 247v2 has a narrower toe area vs v1

customer_reviews.title: Look great but run small
customer_reviews.text: I love the silhouette and the design of this shoe, however they run quite small - I had to size up from a 9 to a 10 for a good fit, with the instep being quite low even on the 10s and needing breaking in. I would recommend trying these out at a store if possible first, but size 1 up if that's not an option.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers- I always buy half a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Love this trainers but always buy myself half a size smaller. I'm normally and 8.5uk but with these I get a UK 8. Depending on the colour they are amazing value, comfy and look great! Prompt service and not had any problems yet. Highly recommend.

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 247v2 Trainers
product_meta.description: These men's 247v2 sneakers from New Balance are designed for your on-the-go lifestyle. These sneakers offers a bootie construction upper for comfort and saddle overlays and heel wrap for support.
feature_bullets: Innovative REVlite midsole provides premium responsiveness and durability at a 30% lighter weight than other foams with comparable performance
